Episode.GuestStars: |Christina Moses|Claire Holt|Darri Ingolesson|Matt Davis|Nathaniel Buzolic|Steven Krueger|Summer Fontana|Taylor Cole|
Episode.Overview: The Mikaelsons find themselves out of options as they face the all-powerful and un-killable entity known as The Hollow. With the life of Hope at stake, Vincent proposes a final, desperate plan – one that will force Klaus, Elijah, Hayley, Rebekah and Freya to make the greatest sacrifice their family has ever endured. Season Finale.
